text:
@ChrisReason7 More @Channel7 bullshit reporting.
Its Coronavirus no matter where it is in the world.
But if course you numptys make it a divisive issue.
#IStandWithDan and @AnnastaciaMP and @MarkMcGowanMP who all took the lead on this where @GladysB @ScottMorrisonMP @PeterDutton_MP faltered.
